authors.name: Abraham Lincoln
quotes: In the end, it's not the years in your life that count. It's the life in your years.

authors.name: Adam Smith
quotes: Science is the great antidote to the poison of enthusiasm and superstition.

authors.name: Aisha Tyler
quotes: Success is not the absence of failure; it’s the persistence through failure.

authors.name: Alan Kay
quotes: The best way to predict the future is to invent it.

authors.name: Alan Watts
quotes: The only way to make sense out of change is to plunge into it, move with it, and join the dance.
Trying to define yourself is like trying to bite your own teeth.
No valid plans for the future can be made by those who have no capacity for living now.
The more a thing tends to be permanent, the more it tends to be lifeless.
To have faith is to trust yourself to the water. When you swim, you don’t grab hold of the water, because if you do, you will sink and drown.
Muddy water is best cleared by leaving it alone.
We cannot be more sensitive to pleasure without being more sensitive to pain.
There is no hurry. Everything that’s meant to happen will happen.
The meaning of life is just to be alive. It is so plain and so obvious and so simple.
The world is filled with love-play, from animal lust to sublime compassion.
To understand music, you must listen to it. But so long as you are thinking, 'I am listening to this music,' you are not listening.
The business of life is to live and be fully aware of our interconnectedness with everything around us.
You are the universe experiencing itself.
You didn't come into this world. You came out of it, like a wave from the ocean.
We do not come into this world; we come out of it, as leaves from a tree.
You are an aperture through which the universe is looking at and exploring itself.

authors.name: Albert Einstein
quotes: In the middle of difficulty lies opportunity.
The definition of insanity is doing the same thing yet expecting different results.
The important thing is not to stop questioning. Curiosity has its own reason for existing.
We cannot solve problems with the kind of thinking we employed when we came up with them.
The more I learn, the more I realize how much I don't know.
The mind that opens to a new idea never returns to its original size.
The most beautiful experience we can have is the mysterious. It is the fundamental emotion that stands at the cradle of true art and true science.
There are only two ways to live your life. One is as though nothing is a miracle. The other is as though everything is a miracle.
It is not that I'm so smart. But I stay with the questions much longer.
The most incomprehensible thing about the universe is that it is comprehensible.
Science is a wonderful thing if one does not have to earn one's living at it.
The important thing is to never stop questioning.
Science is the search for truth, not the search for validation.
The pursuit of truth is more precious than its possession.
The more I learn, the more I realize how much I don’t know.
Persistence is the most powerful force on earth, it can move mountains.

authors.name: Albert Schweitzer
quotes: Success is not the key to happiness. Happiness is the key to success.

authors.name: Anaïs Nin
quotes: We don’t see things as they are, we see them as we are.

authors.name: Ann Landers
quotes: Opportunities are usually disguised as hard work, so most people don't recognize them.

authors.name: Anonymous
quotes: Success is not how high you have climbed, but how you make a positive difference to the world.
If you want to achieve greatness stop asking for permission.
Success is not measured by what you accomplish, but the opposition you have encountered.
We might be wrong, but we are not confused
If you do not know what we want to achieve, how can you learn from it.
Becoming is better than being.
Scarcity is the Mother of Innovation.
Team work, makes dream work.
Alone you may go fast, but together we go further.

authors.name: Aristotle
quotes: The more you know, the more you realize you don't know.

authors.name: Aristotle Onassis
quotes: The secret to success is to know something nobody else knows.

authors.name: Arnold H. Glasow
quotes: Success is not the result of spontaneous combustion. You must set yourself on fire.

authors.name: Babe Ruth
quotes: Never let the fear of striking out keep you from playing the game.

authors.name: Ben Graham
quotes: The individual investor should act consistently as an investor and not as a speculator.

authors.name: Benjamin Graham
quotes: Buy not on optimism, but on arithmetic.

authors.name: Bill Gates
quotes: Your most unhappy customers are your greatest source of learning.

authors.name: Bill Gurley
quotes: One of the most important things to know in venture capital is how to say no.

The biggest mistake you can make is to be too cautious.
Be careful about whom you get into business with.
Being good at venture capital means being able to identify and back great founders.

authors.name: Bill Nye
quotes: Science is the key to our future, and if you don’t believe in science, then you’re holding back the future.

authors.name: Billie Jean King
quotes: Champions keep playing until they get it right.

authors.name: Bo Bennett
quotes: Success is not in what you have, but who you are.

authors.name: Booker T. Washington
quotes: Success is to be measured not so much by the position that one has reached in life as by the obstacles which he has overcome.

authors.name: Bruce Lee

authors.name: Bruce Mau
quotes: Science and art are not separate. They are not two worlds. They are part of the same world.

authors.name: Buddha
quotes: The mind is everything. What you think you become.

authors.name: C.S. Lewis
quotes: You can’t go back and change the beginning, but you can start where you are and change the ending.

authors.name: Carl Lewis
quotes: If you don’t have confidence, you’ll always find a way not to win.

authors.name: Carl Sagan
quotes: Science is a way of thinking much more than it is a body of knowledge.
A scientist is not just a person who knows about science but is someone who can observe and think about the natural world in a new way.
The beauty of a living thing is not the atoms that go into it, but the way those atoms are put together.

authors.name: Charles Kingsleigh
quotes: The only way to achieve the impossible is to believe it is possible.

authors.name: Charlie Munger
quotes: The big money is not in the buying and selling, but in the waiting.
A great business at a fair price is superior to a fair business at a great price.
If you keep learning all the time, you have a wonderful advantage.
The world is not driven by greed; it’s driven by envy.
In my whole life, I have known no wise people who didn’t read all the time.
The best thing a human being can do is to help another human being know more.
You must know the big ideas in the big disciplines and use them routinely.
A lot of people with high IQs are terrible investors because they’ve got terrible temperaments.
Spend each day trying to be a little wiser than you were when you woke up.
It’s not supposed to be easy. Anyone who finds it easy is stupid.
Avoid working directly under somebody you don’t admire and don’t want to be like.
The highest form of civilization is the willingness to share.
Knowing what you don’t know is more useful than being brilliant.
Those who keep learning will keep rising in life.
The best way to get what you want in life is to deserve what you want.
It is remarkable how much long-term advantage people like us have gotten by trying to be consistently not stupid.
The iron rule of life is that only 20% of the people can be in the top fifth.
It's not brilliance that helps you in investing, it's avoiding obvious mistakes.
The safest way to try and get what you want is to try and deserve what you want.
Inverting the problem and thinking backwards is often a useful way to solve it.

authors.name: Chris Grosser
quotes: Opportunities don't happen, you create them.

authors.name: Colin Powell
quotes: There are no secrets to success. It is the result of preparation, hard work, and learning from failure.

authors.name: Colin R. Davis
quotes: The road to success and the road to failure are almost exactly the same.

authors.name: Confucius

authors.name: Dalai Lama

authors.name: Daniel Boorstin
quotes: The greatest obstacle to discovery is not ignorance—it is the illusion of knowledge.

authors.name: G.K. Chesterton
quotes: The commonest kind of trouble is that it is nearly reasonable but not quite.

authors.name: Gary Player
quotes: The more you practice, the luckier you get.

authors.name: Gary Vaynerchuk

Ideas are worthless without execution.
No matter what you do, your job is to tell your story.

The person who gives the value first wins.
Skills are cheap. Passion is priceless.
Stop hanging around people who don't want to win.
Without hustle, talent will only carry you so far.
Your legacy is being written by yourself. Make the right decisions.

The best thing you can do is invest in your own happiness.
Patience is the secret weapon to success in business and life.
Life is long. Play the long game.

authors.name: George S. Patton
quotes: Success is how high you bounce when you hit bottom.

authors.name: George Washington

authors.name: Georgia O'Keeffe
quotes: I found I could say things with color and shapes that I couldn’t say any other way.

quotes: Success usually comes to those who are too busy to be looking for it.

quotes: To be an artist is to believe in life.

quotes: Painting is self-discovery. Every good artist paints what he is.

authors.name: Jeff Bezos
quotes: Your brand is what people say about you when you're not in the room.

quotes: The harder the battle, the sweeter the victory.

quotes: Art must be an expression of love or it is nothing.

authors.name: Marcus Aurelius

quotes: You have to expect things of yourself before you can do them.

quotes: Life is a journey that must be traveled no matter how bad the roads and accommodations.

quotes: The function of leadership is to produce more leaders, not more followers.

quotes: Life is short, and it is up to you to make it sweet.

quotes: Life beats down and crushes the soul, and art reminds you that you have one.

quotes: Art is the only way to run away without leaving home.

quotes: The only place where success comes before work is in the dictionary.

quotes: Color is a power which directly influences the soul.

quotes: You miss 100% of the shots you don’t take.

authors.name: Will Rogers

authors.name: William James

authors.name: Wilson Kanadi
quotes: To be the best, you must be able to handle the worst.

authors.name: Winston Churchill
quotes: Success is walking from failure to failure with no loss of enthusiasm.

authors.name: Zig Ziglar
